snippet: After meeting with President Hamid Karzai of Afghanistan, President Obama said American troops would play a supporting role to Afghans beginning this spring.
abstract: Pres Obama, after meeting with Afghanistan's Pres Hamid Karzai, says American forces will play only supporting role in Afghanistan beginning in spring 2013, opening way for more rapid withdrawal of troops.

byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and MICHAEL R. GORDON

lead_paragraph: After meeting with President Hamid Karzai of Afghanistan, President Obama said American troops would play a supporting role to Afghans beginning this spring.

headline.seo: Obama Accelerates Transition of Security to Afghans
headline.main: Obama Accelerates Transition of Security to Afghans
headline.print_headline: Meeting With Karzai, Obama Accelerates Transition of Security to Afghans

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
